description: The Canada Border Services Agency requires a Senior Enterprise Architect to augment and assist the Enterprise Architecture (EA) Division, within the Border Technology and Innovation Directorate, in the delivery of a mature Architecture Program supporting CBSA transformation agenda.
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

full_summary:
=================
### Enterprise Architect Position - Request for Proposal

**Solicitation Number:** 1000425167
**Reference Number:** PW-23-01030611
**Publication Date:** 2023-03-22

The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) invites qualified bidders to submit proposals for the provision of Senior Enterprise Architect services.

**Objective:**
The successful contractor will augment and assist the Enterprise Architecture (EA) Division, within the Border Technology and Innovation Directorate, in the delivery of a mature Architecture Program supporting CBSA's transformation agenda.

**Key Details:**

* **Trade Agreements:** This solicitation is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA).
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada and the National Capital Region (NCR).
* **Contracting Entity:** Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA)

**Proposal Submission Details:**
* **Proposal Submission Deadline:** 2023-04-14T14:00:00.
* **Contact Information:** Yves Cloutier, Cloutier.Yves@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca

**Notice Documents:**
* _Notice Document ( English):_ Available at HTTPS: //canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/22/e15f90d97960a0e15e7c68bfbfe499a4/pr78831_-1000425167_-_npp_en.pdf
* _Notice Document (French):_ Available at HTTPS: //canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/04/05/513e05b3c919b41d4c4be97040b1601b/pr78831_-1000425167_-_npp_en_-_amd_001.pdf (with Amendment 1)

**Attachements:**
* _Attachements (English):_ Available at HTTPS: //canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/04/05/b16661b1de4fb32fa61e4d3569b243e9/pr78831_-100042
